div.pre: 483 Philippi environs, Macedonia, 1965 or earlier Burial: c. 140 B.C. (M) Contents: 25 AE Amphipolis: 14 (as SNGCop. 52-6 [2]; 62 [4]; 63 [1]; 64-7 [7]) Pella: 3 (as SNGCop. 256 [1]; 257 [1]; 257-60 [1]) Thessalonica: 1 (as SNGCop. 350) Antigonus Gonatas: 1 (as SNGCop. 1205 ff.) Philip V: 3 (as SNGCop. 1238 [1]; 1258-60 [1]; 1261-2 [1]) Macedonia, G. Publilius: 2 (as SNGCop. 1323) Unc.: 1 Disposition: MÃ¼nster
